etomica.models.oneDHardRods

Class MeterDifferentImageAdd1D

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataSourceScalar
      • etomica.models.oneDHardRods.MeterDifferentImageAdd1D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource

    public class MeterDifferentImageAdd1D
extends DataSourceScalar
    Uses a Widom-like insertion of a mode to calculate a probability. Uses a different box than the main simulation, to assume an extra mode & rod are added
